title: Surely A Happy Ending - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Love Interests   Couple Growth   Divorce   Flashbacks   Handsome Male Lead   Late Romance   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Reincarnation   Second Chance
author: Flada   플아다
description:
Yeon-Woo’s husband Seon-jae died the day they ended their arrange marriage. Yeon-Woo, who’s swept in sorrow and grieve, was given a second chance to return back 100 days in time!

As she struggles to prevent the death of her husband, their ‘real’ marriage has only just begun. This is the story of a late budding romance, faced with danger and life at stake.

“This time, I’ll make sure that we Must Have A Happy Ending!”>
